General.Name: Exprivia S.p.A
General.Description: Exprivia S.p.A. provides digital transformation solutions in Italy and internationally. The company offers big data and analytics, cloud, Internet of things, IT security, mobile, SAP, and business process outsourcing solutions. It also designs and manages services and infrastructure for call centers, contact centers, and helpdesks; and develops ground stations for the reception and processing of satellite data. In addition, the company organizes and manages Master in Management and Industrial Development program, as well as specialized seminars and training courses for companies and public administration; offers professional and project development services in the SAP environment, IT infrastructure, and WEB portal development; and provides healthcare solutions and information systems. It serves the banking, finance, and insurance; telecom and media; energy and utilities; aerospace and defense; manufacturing and distribution; healthcare; and public sector industries. The company is headquartered in Molfetta, Italy.
